item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. DeepGEMM: clean and efficient FP8 GEMM kernels with fine-grained scaling (284 points | 51 comments)
2. I Went to SQL Injection Court (835 points | 331 comments)

10. Ggwave: Tiny Data-over-Sound Library (174 points | 40 comments)

13. Hard problems that reduce to document ranking (242 points | 31 comments)
14. If it is worth keeping, save it in Markdown (218 points | 144 comments)

20. Tristan Davey's Punch Card Archive (9 points | 3 comments)
21. Emergent Misalignment: Narrow finetuning can produce broadly misaligned LLMs [pdf] (121 points | 68 comments)
22. Modernist Cuisine: The Art and Science of Cooking (72 points | 52 comments)
23. Embedding Python in Elixir, it's fine (272 points | 56 comments)
24. Chicory: A JVM native WebAssembly runtime (171 points | 62 comments)
25. New maps of the chaotic space-time inside black holes (120 points | 66 comments)
26. Voker (YC S24) is hiring an LA-based full stack AI software engineer ( | hide)
27. Framework's first desktop is a strange–but unique–mini ITX gaming PC (458 points | 423 comments)

29. EdgeDB is now Gel and Postgres is the future (133 points | 79 comments)
